This week, we'll continue our discussion of instrumental variables, focusing on tests for weak instruments and on the interpretation of an instrumenal variables estimate. 


### Objectives
- Understand and describe the problem of weak instruments and how to test for weak instruments empirically
- Define and explain a local average treatment effect


### Activities 
- Continue work with the [CDC Tax Burden on Tobacco](https://github.com/imccart/CDC-Tobacco) data
- Data simulation and practical issues with IV
- [Weekly check-in](/assignment/weekly-check-in.html) due on Friday

- Chapter 19 of [The Effect: An Introduction to Research Design and Causality](https://theeffectbook.net/)
- Chapter 4 of [@angrist2009]
